Package groupquattro.demo.services

Class ChestServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
groupquattro.demo.services.ChestServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChestService
@Service public class ChestServiceImpl extends Object implements ChestService
A Service class for the entity chest It should not be accessed by any class that reside in a package repository and it should not access classes that reside in a package api

    • deposit

      public void deposit(String chestId, double amount) throws ChestOpenedException, ResourceNotFoundException
      Members can deposit only when the chest is still closed which is, when current value inside chest is strictly less than the max amount, which is in turn the amount of money that "opens" the chest
